name: Downhill Doggo
description:
Doggo wants to show off his radical skater moves, but he picked the busiest street in town!
There's no stopping him now, just try to keep him safe!

Controls:

Click on pedestrians to dodge Doggo (Click and hold for large groups)

Click and drag vehicles to swerve out of the way

See how long Doggo can last!

This game was created by Brian Duffy for the GMTK Game Jam 2020
All non-original game assets used under license.
